snippet: A major shortfall in the number of private security guards available to protect sporting venues and other sensitive sites has forced the government to draft additional troops.
abstract: British government drafts an additional 3,500 troops to make up for a major shortfall in the number of private security guards available to protect more than 100 sporting venues, hotels and other sensitive sites during the Olympic Games.
lead_paragraph: A major shortfall in the number of private security guards available to protect sporting venues and other sensitive sites has forced the government to draft additional troops.

headline.main: Britain: Olympics Duty for 3,500 More Troops
headline.print_headline: Britain: Olympics Duty For 3,500 More Troops
